tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalSupplies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    supply_item_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    from_location VARCHAR,
    to_location VARCHAR,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE supply_items (
    supply_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR,
    item_description TEXT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR,
    date_of_manufacture DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    current_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalSupplies (
    supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplyMovements (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_id INT,
    movement_date DATE,
    from_location VARCHAR(255),
    to_location VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_supply FOREIGN KEY (supply_id) REFERENCES MedicalSupplies(supply_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplyTrackHistory (
    track_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    track_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_supply FOREIGN KEY (supply_id) REFERENCES MedicalSupplies(supply_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_supplies (
    supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_id INT,
    from_location VARCHAR(50),
    to_location VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    block_hash VARCHAR(50),
    previous_block_hash VARCHAR(50),
    miner_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalSupplies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SupplyMovements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_id INT,
  from_location VARCHAR(255),
  to_location VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BlockchainTransactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id VARCHAR(255),
  block_hash VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Permissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  role_id INT,
  permission_type VARCHAR(255)
)
